医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
使用燃气和丙烷炉的美国家庭二氧化氮排放对健康的影响和人口不平等燃气灶和丙烷炉的室内二氧化氮 (NO2) 排放并评估其健康影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Health-impacts-and-demographic-inequities-from- Nitrogen-diode-emissions-in-US-homes-using-gas-and-propane-stoves。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Health-impacts-and-demographic-inequities-from- Nitrogen-diode-emissions-in-US-homes-using-gas-and-propane-stoves。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=44ce5b3c-7e26-4c23-84dd-9fcbf57776a0 Wed, 08 May 2024 05:38:00 -0400 Health impacts and demographic inequities from nitrogen dioxide emissions in US homes using gas and propane stoves
研究发现慢性病会增加因热暴露而住院的几率环境热暴露对患有不同数量和组合的慢性病的个体住院治疗的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Chronic-disease-increases-the-odds-of-hospitalization-from-heat-exposure-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Chronic-disease-increases-the-odds-of-hospitalization-from-heat-exposure-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c9e5fbf2-bcdb-4b7b-ab63-5c727b84b14d Wed, 08 May 2024 05:00:00 -0400 Chronic disease increases the odds of hospitalization from heat exposure, study finds
您的多动症药物是否会增加您患青光眼的风险？ ADHD 药物使用者患青光眼的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Does-your-ADHD-medication-increase-your-risk-of-glaucoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Does-your-ADHD-medication-increase-your-risk-of-glaucoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c80517a5-6998-47d4-990f-de60dacef249 Wed, 08 May 2024 04:28:00 -0400 Does your ADHD medication increase your risk of glaucoma?
利物浦大学投资 100 万英镑为医疗保健学生建造最先进的教学设施利物浦大学已投资超过 100 万英镑购买最先进的新教学设施，旨在为医疗保健学生提供独特的学习机会。联合健康专业和护理学院的弗洛伦斯·南丁格尔和罗斯·汤普森套房现已开放。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/University-of-Liverpool-invests-c2a31M-in-state-of-the-art-teaching-facilities-for-healthcare-students.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/University-of-Liverpool-invests-c2a31M-in-state-of-the-art-teaching-facilities-for-healthcare-students.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ba2fdcc0-6791-450e-94e7-543745fcb748 Wed, 08 May 2024 03:27:00 -0400 University of Liverpool invests £1M in state-of-the-art teaching facilities for healthcare students
澳大利亚女士敦促政府对神经学研究资助采取行动澳大利亚女士对政府投资健康和医学研究的承诺表示欢迎，但担心神经学研究没有得到足够的关注或资金。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/MS-Australia-urges-government-action-on-neurological-research-funding.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/MS-Australia-urges-government-action-on-neurological-research-funding.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7e3fd363-a948-4d66-963c-d8ec3926aef7 Wed, 08 May 2024 03:23:00 -0400 MS Australia urges government action on neurological research funding
《时代》杂志公布新名单，表彰健康领域 100 名最具影响力的人物今天，《时代》杂志公布了首届《TIME100 健康》榜单，表彰了健康领域最具影响力的 100 名个人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/TIME-reveals-new-list-recognizing-the-100-most-influenceial-individuals-in-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/TIME-reveals-new-list-recognizing-the-100-most-influenceial-individuals-in-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9370aa58-e86e-4a49-8ead-762268316fe5 Wed, 08 May 2024 03:14:00 -0400 TIME reveals new list recognizing the 100 most influential individuals in health
新报告揭示了英国健康和社会护理劳动力面临的隐藏挑战近五分之一 (18%) 的灵活医疗和社会护理工作者（通过私人提供商从事代理工作的人）预计在未来两年内离开该行业。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/New-report-shines-light-on-the-hidden-challenges-of-UKe28099s-health-and-social-care-workforce.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/New-report-shines-light-on-the-hidden-challenges-of-UKe28099s-health-and-social-care-workforce.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2a594d2e-d60a-4c29-a788-8df9ae3c7eeb Wed, 08 May 2024 03:04:00 -0400
APOE4 基因与早发性阿尔茨海默氏症相关，是治疗干预的目标《Nature Medicine》上发表的一项研究描述了 APOE4 纯合性如何从 55 岁起显着加速阿尔茨海默病的病理学和生物标志物，表明该疾病的独特形式和靶向治疗的潜在焦点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/APOE4-gene-linked-to-early-onset-Alzheimers-target-for-therapeutic-intervention.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/APOE4-gene-linked-to-early-onset-Alzheimers-target-for-therapeutic-intervention.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=84f734e8-907c-428f-b4b4-97fd396ee7b8 Wed, 08 May 2024 01:20:00 -0400 APOE4 gene linked to early onset Alzheimer's, target for therapeutic intervention
橄榄油——每天7克可以预防痴呆症！ 《JAMA Network Open》发表的一项大规模研究表明，每天食用 7 克或更多橄榄油可以将美国成年人与痴呆症相关的死亡率降低 28%，强调了饮食习惯在控制与年龄相关的认知能力下降方面的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Olive-oil-e28093-7-grams-per-day-may-keep-the-dementia-away!.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Olive-oil-e28093-7-grams-per-day-may-keep-the-dementia-away!.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=741b4f69-702e-4318-8bd8-d2bd86d5399a Wed, 08 May 2024 00:49:00 -0400 Olive oil – 7 grams per day may keep the dementia away!
研究表明奶牛的乳腺中同时含有人类和禽流感受体研究调查了甲型流感病毒（IAV）受体在牛呼吸道、大脑和乳腺组织中的表达，揭示了人和鸭受体在乳腺中的显着定位以及鸡呼吸道中的主要受体，这可能影响甲型流感病毒的传播和发病机制。牛的 IAV。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Study-shows-cows-harbor-both- human-and-avian-flu-receptors-in-their-mammary-glands.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Study-shows-cows-harbor-both- human-and-avian-flu-receptors-in-their-mammary-glands.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=db7630eb-74c4-4560-b8f2-ff1ab9454c85 Wed, 08 May 2024 00:29:00 -0400 Study shows cows harbor both human and avian flu receptors in their mammary glands
